title: Apex Business Supplies Microfibre cloth Pack of 5 Blue 32 X 32 Cm Cloth | Reusable cleaning cloths, Kitchen Cloth | Streak Free & lint-free cloth, Super Absorbent Microfibre
features: [Blue Microfibre Cleaning Cloth] These Cleaning Cloths are Suitable for a wide range of surfaces including glass, stainless steel, countertops, and more.
[Streak-free, Lint-free] Our Microfiber Cleaning Cloth is Engineered with ultra-fine microfibre technology for streak-free, crystal-clear results on glass surfaces.
[Glass Cleaning Microfibre Cloth] Crafted from premium microfiber, our glass windows & mirror cleaning cloths ensure streak-free, lint-free results.
[Kitchen and Dishes Microfibre Cloth] Specially designed microfiber cloths for tackling tough kitchen and dish cleaning tasks.
[Car and dashboard Microfibre Cloth] : Soft and non-abrasive material ensures safe cleaning without scratching delicate car interiors and Body
[Eco-Friendly Option]Reusable cloths offer an environmentally conscious alternative to disposable wipes or paper towels.
description: Product Description Microfiber Cloths These microfiber cloths enable you to clean better, faster, and with less effort. Those cleaning- clothes are designed with extra softness and thickness. Suitable to be used by a professional detailer or a car enthusiast who requires the highest quality results. Diffeirnet Colour Choices With the different colour options, This microfiber will make your housework much more enjoyable and easier. The multi-purpose cloths come 5,12,24,50 in a pack in assorted colours. Material Thanks to their high-quality 100% polyester material, they will last longer.
